data.name: Salute Account
data.description: Our Salute savings account rewards Australian Defence Force members who have been deployed, have reached 15 and 25 years of service or have transitioned with bonus interest for 12 months.

features.additionalValue: A high bonus interest for 12 months
Access via our award-winning banking app.
Faster, Simper ways to make payments

eligibility.additionalInfo: Product available only for members who meet a recognised ADF milestone.
$1500 per month into your Everyday Access account.
Our Salute account rewards those who have been deployed, have reached 15 and 25 years of service or have transitioned out with bonus interest for 12 months.
Available to ADF members who are within 90days either side of milestones.

fees.name: Overdrawn/over limit fees.
fees.additionalInfo: Each time your account is overdrawn or your credit limit is exceeded without authorisation, by more than $50.00. On each subsequent debit transaction while your account is overdrawn or your credit limit has been exceeded, by more than $50.00.

fees.name: Statement fees.
fees.additionalInfo: Where you request monthly or ad-hoc statements.

fees.name: Auto transfer/BPAY dishonour fee.
fees.additionalValue: Charged where there are insufficient funds in your account when the Auto Transfer or BPAY payment is due to be made.

fees.name: Cheque/direct debit honour /dishonour fee.
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when: We decide to honour your personal cheque for payment where there are insufficient funds in your account or the credit limit will be/has been exceeded.We dishonour payment of your personal cheque due to insufficient funds, payment stopped or the cheque is incorrectly completed (e.g. no signature).We decline a direct debit request due to insufficient funds.We decide to honour a direct debit request where there are insufficient funds in your account or the credit limit will be/has been exceeded.

fees.name: Ultimate Package fees (for those only that have a banking package option)
fees.additionalInfo: Package fee - For Banking Package holders.

fees.name: Same day domestic transfers (via Swift/RTGS) - Outbound transfers
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when funds transferred outbound domestically (via via Swift/RTGS)

fees.name: Same day domestic transfers (via Swift/RTGS) - inwards transfers
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when funds transferred inbound domestically (via via Swift/RTGS)

depositRates.calculationFrequency: Interest is calculated daily on the closing balance and paid monthly.
depositRates.additionalValue: Credited on the last day of each month.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Base variable rate. Account balances above $100,000. The variable rate after 12 months.

depositRates.calculationFrequency: Total - Bonus fixed & variable rate for 12 months up to $100,000. Interest is calculated daily on the closing balance.
depositRates.additionalValue: Credited on the last day of each month.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Bonus rate is the total rate payable for the first 12 months.
